author: cnbc.com
title: P&F Industries To Report Results For The Year Ended December 31, 2017
text:
MELVILLE, N.Y., March 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- P&F Industries, Inc. (NASDAQ GM: PFIN), plans to release its results for the year ended December 31, 2017, before the market opens on Wednesday, March 28, 2018. The company has scheduled a conference call beginning at 11:00 a.m. Eastern time the same day.
The dial-in number for the conference call is 800-967-7185. For those who cannot listen to the live broadcast, a replay of the call will be accessible through the Company's web site beginning approximately twenty-four hours later.
About P&F Industries Inc.
P&F Industries, Inc., through its wholly owned subsidiaries, is a leading manufacturer and importer of air-powered tools and accessories sold principally to the retail, industrial and automotive markets. P&F's products are sold under its own trademarks, as well as under the private labels of major manufacturers and retailers.

SOURCE P&F Industries, Inc.
